description: Translate every row that has a valid NFL attribute. Note only one NFL attribute exists per layer in the source data.
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID.
Can derive a wet moisture using source value lowland and flooded.
Maps source value percent of coverage to STRUCTURE_PER
Calculate number of layer according to vegetation composition.

validation_rules: notNull({non_for, species_1}, TRUE);notEmpty({non_for, species_1}, TRUE |NOT_APPLICABLE);matchListTwice(non_for, species_1,{'FL'}, {'WATER','ISLAND'} |NOT_APPLICABLE)
description: Catch if both species_1 and nat_non_veg are null. Or both empty.
Maps source value to NAT_NON_VEG using list of values
Maps source value to NON_FOR_VEG using list of values.
